original_text: And he saith unto him, Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee, thou wicked servant. Thou knewest that I was an austere man, taking up that I laid not down, and reaping that I did not sow:
korean_text: 주인이 이르되 악한 종아 내가 네 말로 너를 심판하노니 너는 내가 두지 않은 것을 취하고 심지 않은 것을 거두는 엄한 사람인 줄로 알았느냐

sentences.original_text: Out of thine own mouth will I judge thee
sentences.korean_translation: 네 입에서 나온 말로 내가 너를 심판하리라

sentences.original_text: Thou knewest that I was an austere man
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 내가 엄한 사람인 줄 알았지

sentences.original_text: taking up that I laid not down
and reaping that I did not sow
